member_organisations:
The presence of IEEE in Europe is assured by, on the one hand, the IEEE individual members (nearly 60,000 engineers, scientists and technical professionals who comprise IEEE's European membership), and on the other hand the IEEE European Public Policy Committee (EPPC). 
 
The EPPC’s structure consists of the following bodies: 
 
The EPPC is a IEEE Committee with a Chair and Committee members, responsible to the IEEE Board of Directors for the coordination of public policy activities relevant to the interests of IEEE members in European Union (EU) and European Free Trade Association (EFTA) countries, which are designed to benefit IEEE members, engineering professionals and the general public. 
The EPPC also convenes two working groups, one on Information and Communication Technologies (ICT) and one on Energy. Both groups are composed of a Chair and IEEE volunteers from the EU and EFTA countries, with expertise in these technical fields.
fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: ICT, Energy, mobility, standardisation, education & qualification,  ethical considerations in technology design, Intellectual Policy Rights, and research & innovation.
organisation_name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers, Incorporated (IEEE)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: European Multi-Stakeholders Platform on ICT Standardisation#E02758#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2758#Member#C#High-Level Expert Group on Artificial Intelligence#E03591#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3591#Member#C
goals__remit: IEEE is the world’s largest professional association dedicated to advancing technological innovation and excellence for the benefit of humanity. IEEE and its members inspire a global community through IEEE's highly cited publications, conferences, technology standards, and professional and educational activities.
industry_forums: Member of Knowledge4Innovation (K4I) and the European Internet Forum (EIF)
relevant_communication: Technology policy events (symposia, summits, roundtables), technical policy whitepapers, and expert input to EU consultations in organization's fields of interest.
